column1: Mrs Bennett, still at Hillmarden House, Edna in Cornwall and Karen in a temporary post, sent almost identical cards : a baby in a muslin - trimmed cot surrounded by blue birds and butterflies, the only difference being the unfortunate — at least, to Celia — personal wording in Edna's which ran, May your long - awaited bundle of joy bring you lasting happiness.
